steps.content: Appeal to a Leo's fun-loving nature with activity-based outings. steps.title: Leo men appreciate art and aesthetics.
steps.content: Leo men appreciate art and aesthetics. As an Aquarius, you likely have your own creative hobbies as well. Share that creative side of yourself with him and consider collaborating on something together, even. Your mutual interest in the arts will bring you closer and deepen your connection. If you both make music, invite him over for a jam session or check out a local music store together. If you're more into art appreciation, invite him to check out a local art exhibit, go to a concert, or catch a new independent film.

steps.title: A Leo guy wants a partner who isn't threatened by his social life.
steps.content: A Leo guy wants a partner who isn't threatened by his social life. Spending time with friends is usually very important to a Leo, even when they're in a committed relationship. He'll appreciate it if you make an effort to get to know his friends. Next time you're in a group together, participate in the conversation and try to get along with everyone. Leo's may be super social, but they're also known for being loyal.

steps.title: Leos are faithful partners, and they expect the same commitment.
steps.content: Leos are faithful partners, and they expect the same commitment. As an Aquarius, you might be a little more open to a nontraditional arrangement than a Leo (though everyone is different). Leos tend to be monogamous, though, so avoid giving other people attention to make him jealous. That will likely backfire and make him lose interest. You can also: Stay by your Leo guy's side when you're out on dates. Ditching him to hang with your friends at a party might make him feel a little left out. Invite him along to join in on the fun!

steps.content: Caring and genuine, a Leo guy wants to connect deeply with his partner.
